svg.script: // This image has a preserveAspectRatio attribute (animated into // existence), so the bonus image element will use that value // because of the "defer" in its preserveAspectRatio. var grid = generateImageGrid("blueRect10x10-viewBox-animPAR.svg", 40, 20, "defer xMinYMin"); grid.setAttribute("transform", "translate(10, 10)"); document.documentElement.appendChild(grid);
